name: AnimatedSize
desc: Animated widget that automatically transitions its size over a given duration whenever the given child's size changes.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: alignment
fields.desc: The alignment of the child within the parent when the parent is not yet the same size as the child.

fields.name: curve
fields.desc: The animation curve when transitioning this widget's size to match the child's size.

fields.name: duration
fields.desc: The duration when transitioning this widget's size to match the child's size.

fields.name: reverseDuration
fields.desc: The duration when transitioning this widget's size to match the child's size when going in reverse.

fields.name: onEnd
fields.desc: Called every time an animation completes.
